title: tee vaLarttiDuvOm
sahitya:
tI vaLarttiDuvOm peru tI vaLarttiDuvOm

1 AviyinuLLum ariviniDaiyilum anbai vaLarttiDuvOm viNNin
 Ashai vaLarttiDuvOm kaliyAval vaLarttiDuvOm oru 
dEvi maghanait-tiramaik-kaDavuLai shen kadir vAnavanai viNNOm tamait
tEnukkazhaippavanaip-prrum tiran shErndau paNindiDuvOm vArIr

2  cittat-tuNivinai mAnuDar kELvanait-tImai vazhippavanai nanmai
 shErndu koDuppavanai pala shIrgaLuDaiyavanai bhuvi
 attanaiyum shuDar Erat-tigazhndiDum Ariyar nAyakanai uruddiran
 anbuttirumaghanai perum tiravAgip-paNinidiDuvOm vArIr

3  kaTTugaL pOkki viDudalai tandiDum kaNmaNi pOnravanai emmaik-
kAval puribavanait-tollaik-kATTai azhippavanai dishai
eTTum pugazh vaLarttOngiDa viddaigaL yAvum pazhagiDavE bhuvimishai
inbam perugiDavE perum tiran eidip-paNindiDuvOm vArIr

4  nenjirk-kavalaigaL nOvugaL yAvaiyum nIkkik-koDuppavanai uyir 
nILattirubavanai oLir nErmaip-perum kanalai nittam
anjal anjal enru kUri emakku nallANmai shamaippavanaip-palveTrigaL
Akkik-koDuppavanaip-perum tiran aghip-paNindiDuvOm

5  accattai kaTTangu shAmbaruminri azhittiDum vAnavani shegai
AtrumaticcuDarait-taDaiyaTra perum tiralai emmun
Iccaiyum vETkaiyum Ashaiyum kAdalum eTradOr nallaramum kalandoLi
Erum tavakkanalaip-perum tiran eidip-paNindiDuvOm vArIr

6  vAnagattai shenru tINDuvaningenru maNDi ezundazhalaik-kavi
vANarkku nallamudait-tozhil vaNNam terindavanai nalla
tEnaiyum pAlaiyum neyyaiyum shOTraiyum tImpazham yAvinaiyum ingEyuNDu
tEkkik-kaLippavanaip-perum tiran shErndu paNIndiDuvOm vArIr

7  cittira mALigai ponnoLir mADangaL dEvattirumagaLir inbat-
tEkkiDum tEnishagaL shuvai tEriDu nalliLamai nalla
muttu mANigaLum ponnu nirainda muzhukkuDam parppalavum ingE tara
murppaTTu nirppavanaip-perum tiran moittup-paNindiDuvOm vArIr
